home.name: Mark Taratynov
home.title: I build and enjoy things for the web.
home.description: I'm a fullstack developer who enjoys building web applications that are both useful and easy to use. My journey started with curiosity and grew through consistent practice. I focus on learning modern technologies and applying them in real projects step by step.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Since my childhood, I've been eager to solve problems. When I got my first PC with an AMD Duron 700MHz processor, if I remember correctly, something went wrong. Without the internet, I managed to fix it on my own by delving into the BIOS and installing different drivers, and I was just 10 y.o. I'm highly motivated by a growth mindset, always looking for opportunities to learn, improve, and contribute.
about.principleQuote: Patience and diligent effort are the keys to personal development and progress.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? I'm always open to new ideas and collaborations.

fullstackDeveloper.title: Fullstack Developer, open source
fullstackDeveloper.description: Comprehensive fullstack development program focused on modern web technologies, including React, Node.js, databases, and open-source contributions. Learning industry best practices and agile development methodologies.

municipalAdultEducation.title: Municipal Adult Education
municipalAdultEducation.description: Intensive language studies to achieve proficiency in Swedish and English, enabling better integration into Swedish society and professional communication in international environments.

javascriptCourse.title: The Complete JavaScript Course 2025: From Zero to Expert!
javascriptCourse.skills: JavaScript, ES6+, DOM, OOP, AJAX, APIs, NPM, Parcel, Modern Web Development
javascriptCourse.description: Comprehensive JavaScript course covering fundamentals to advanced concepts including ES6+, DOM manipulation, Object-Oriented Programming, asynchronous programming, working with APIs, and modern development tools.

bachelorAthletics.title: Bachelor's degree in Athletics
bachelorAthletics.description: Four-year degree program focusing on sports science, athletic training methodologies, biomechanics, physiology, and coaching techniques. Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills through scientific approach to athletics.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.

pokemon.name: Pokémon App
pokemon.description: A comprehensive React application for exploring Pokémon data with interactive features: Browse Pokémon, view detailed stats, check evolution chains, and more.

hakimLivs.name: Hakim Livs
hakimLivs.description: Hakim Livs Webshop is a full-stack e-commerce application built by modern concepts and technologies with user authentication through JWT auth

quizApp.name: Quiz App
quizApp.description: A dynamic quiz application built with modern web technologies, featuring interactive questions and real-time scoring.

adventCalendar.name: Advent Calendar 2024
adventCalendar.description: An interactive advent calendar application with daily surprises and festive animations.

weatherApp.name: Weather App 2025
weatherApp.description: A modern weather application providing accurate forecasts with beautiful UI and responsive design.

sortify.name: Sortify
sortify.description: An efficient sorting and organization tool with intuitive interface and powerful features.

parallax.name: Parallax Effect
parallax.description: A simple study project based on theme The Witcher using by Parallax and Swiper libraries in JS.

techStack.title: My Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: Here's a collection of technologies I've been working with across frontend, backend, and development tools. Each of them plays a role in how I build, test, and ship modern web applications.
